badge_description: It’s official - you are part of history! Untappd has reached its one billionth check-in of all time. Cheers to our global family of users and let’s raise a beer to many, many more! #checkinlife #onebillionbeers
badge_hint: Check-in to ANY beer between March 27, 2021 and March 29, 2021

badge_description: This special badge is just one way to celebrate women’s achievements in the beer industry and beyond. On International Women’s Day choose to seek out and celebrate women’s contributions and raise awareness against bias. #ChooseToChallenge #IWD2021
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between March 6, 2021 - March 8, 2021

badge_description: Drinking Socially podcast is back for Season 4 with more beer, more guests, and more shenanigans! Listen, drink along, and level up this badge with hosts Jon Dispenza and Harrison Hickok as they talk all things beer, brewing, Untappd and more. Tune in today!
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer that gets reviewed on the Untappd Podcast and level up with any additional unique check-in between January 20, 2021 - January 19, 2022!

badge_description: They know what you want when you walk in the door. That’s right, you don’t have to wait for anyone here.

badge_description: Cheers! Raise those bottles high. You know good beer when you taste it—and that's exactly why you choose beer in glass bottles. Brewers trust glass because they know it keeps beer tasting fresh & full of flavor. We at O-I Glass are glad you do too! #ChooseGlass
badge_hint: Check-in to  three (3) beers using the serving style of bottle between November 1, 2020 - January 31, 2021

badge_description: Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 5 Beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 2.
badge_hint: Drink 5 different beers from the United Kingdom or England.

badge_description: ‘Tis the season to think about GIVING. Our incredible community has the collective power of good in their hands – donate to a local foodbank, shelter or support your local brewery. Share your experience on social media using #untappdgiving

badge_description: November 29th is Small Brewery Sunday! Inside, outside, or curbside … let’s support the indie craft breweries that are making this crazy year just a little bit better — one delicious craft beer at a time
badge_hint: Check-in any beer from any Brewery a part of the Brewers Association between November 17, 2020 - November 29, 2020

badge_description: International Stout Day is on November 5th and along with it, a worldwide celebration of one of the styles that truly helped shape the world of beer, the Stout! This rich and full bodied style has a long history well worth raising a toast to.
badge_hint: Check-in any beer with the style stout between November 2, 2020 - November 9, 2020

badge_description: It's that time of year again, help us celebrate the spooky season with this years witch's brew.  Happy Halloween!
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between October 30, 2020 - November 1, 2020

badge_description: Cheers to 10 years of Untappd! From a small idea hatched in 2010 to connect people with their next favorite beer, we've reached this amazing milestone thanks to you, Untappd Community. We wouldn't be here without your support and your love for beer. Here's to the next 10! We'll see you this Saturday, October 24th for our 10th Anniversary Virtual Celebration. Click here for all the details!
badge_hint: Check-in any beer between October 19th 2020 to October 25th, 2020, in your local time-zone.

badge_description: You don’t have to be a superhero to enjoy a strong beer. Boasting a higher than average ABV, these styles really do pack a punch, so be ready for it. That's 5 different beers with style of Strong Ale - American, Strong Ale - English, Strong Ale - Other, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Golden Ale or Lager - Strong. Try 5 more for Level 2!
badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers have the style of Strong Ale - American, Strong Ale - English, Strong Ale - Other, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Golden Ale or Lager - Strong.

badge_description: Raise your glass and join us in supporting the many Black is Beautiful collaboration beers as we come together to recognize and bring awareness to the injustices that many people of color face daily.

badge_description: That's at least one beer a day for seven days. Looks like you had quite the sudsy week. Cheers!

badge_description: You're definitely getting after it now! How about another challenge? After your next workout, reward yourself with Slightly Mighty, a low calorie beer that tastes like something other than a light beer. Slightly Mighty is a true indie craft beer with all the character of a world class IPA, but with only 95 calories, 3.6g carbs, 1g protein and 0g fat per 12oz serving. Learn more!
badge_hint: Check into any one of the following beers to earn the badge: SeaQuench Ale, Slightly Mighty, Namaste White, SuperEIGHT between 7/16/19 - 8/16/19.`

badge_description: Raise a can to toast the summer with Dogfish Head's all-new Off­-Centered Activity Box. A summer-centric variety 12-pack of cans that features four of our most sessionable sippers, including fan-favorites like SeaQuench Ale and Namaste White, and two new offerings - SuperEIGHT and Slightly Mighty. The Off-Centered Activity Box also doubles as a functional cooler-just pop it open and add ice!
badge_hint: Check into any one of the following beers to earn the badge: SeaQuench Ale, Slightly Mighty, Namaste White, SuperEIGHT between 5/15/19 - 9/15/19.

badge_description: No matter what's in your pint glass today, we want to wish you a Happy St. Patrick's Day. May the luck of the Irish be with you!

badge_description: Happy International Women’s Day! Let’s raise a glass to all of the amazing women in the beer industry. Cheers to you and we look forward to celebrating with you in the years to come!

badge_description: Nice job exploring the world of beer. You've sampled over 100 different brews!

badge_description: #JanuQuenchy is back! We want to shed some holiday pounds but we don’t want to give up drinking really good beer. Enter SeaQuench Ale, the award-winning low-calorie beer that happens to be the most thirst-quenching beer Dogfish has ever brewed. This month join founder Sam Calagione and the Dogfish crew as we resolve to eat sensibly, do something active, and commit to SeaQuench Ale being the only beer we drink all month. Check out our blog for some encouragement from Sam!
badge_hint: Check-in one SeaQuench Ale from Dogfish Head between 1/1/19 - 1/31/19.

badge_description: The beer you're currently enjoying will do more than just satisfy your taste buds; it will help Californians recover from the worst wild fires in the state's history. Brewed by more than 1400 breweries around the country, all proceeds from these beers benefit Sierra Nevada's Camp Fire Relief Fund. You can learn more and make donations here.
badge_hint: Check-in to one (1) beer with the term ‘Resilience’ in the name between December 15th - March 1st.
